commit.message:
re PR c++/28557 (Trouble with templated type conversion operator)

	PR c++/28557
	* pt.c (tsubst_baselink): Substitute into BASELINK_OPTYPE.
	PR c++/28557
	* g++.dg/template/conv9.C: New test.

From-SVN: r115886
